name: Blocky Boxing Match 3D - Endless Hunter Survival Craft Game (Free Edition)
name_original: Blocky Boxing Match 3D - Endless Hunter Survival Craft Game (Free Edition)
description:
-- Let's get ready to RumbleEEEEE! -- FREE FREE FREE
Bring your Superstars, Muhammad Ali, Mike Tyson, Lennox Lewis, Wladimir Klitschko or Tyson Fury to win the belt! Attack with CATS, GOATS and Crafts!
Immersive and ridicoulus gameplay and massively addictive Boxing game!

FEATURES
- 50+ unique superstars!
- 30+ special attacks like: Goat Rush, ThunderBolt, Goat Milk Attack and so on!
- Endless replay option!
- GameCenter to compete your friends!
- Social sharing functions!
- Cats, Goats and Crafts!

Coming soon:
- Local and Worldwide multiplayer!
- New locations in every update!
- More Special attacks
- More Skins!

Get It and tell your friends!

Have FUN!
